img_summary: The image depicts a serene meditation spot located at The Pines, Temple of Yellow Flowers. It features a tranquil setting with a person seated in meditation, surrounded by natural elements and soft lighting. This spot is part of a video game walkthrough, guiding players to find the meditation area and explore the surroundings, including the Snake Shriff Spirit on a nearby platform. The narrative role of this image is to provide players with a visual reference for locating and experiencing the meditation spot within the game.
